channel.title: FIFRA Scientific Advisory Panel
channel.description: Updated FIFRA Scientific Advisory Panel content from the US Environmental Protection Agency

item.title: Meeting Materials for the December 13-16, 2016 Scientific Advisory Panel
item.description:
Topic: Carcinogenic Potential of Glyphosate 

The Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act Scientific Advisory Panel (SAP) will meet December 13-16, 2016, to consider and review a set of scientific issues being evaluated by the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) regarding EPA's evaluation of the carcinogenic potential of the herbicide glyphosate. This is the meeting that was rescheduled from October 18-21, 2016. 

EPA has published meeting materials in docket EPA-HQ-OPP-2016-0385 at www.regulations.gov, including a glyphosate issue paper with the Agency’s proposed classification that glyphosate is not likely to be carcinogenic to humans at doses relevant for human health risk assessment. The meeting materials, charge, panel members and panel biosketches for this SAP meeting are also posted on the Scientific Advisory Panel website, below.

NOTE: On Friday, December 16, the meeting will start at 8:00am.

Visit docket EPA-HQ-OPP-2016-0385 for additional background materials.

  • Charge to the Panel (December 13-16, 2016) (PDF)(4 pp, 30 K)
  • Glyphosate Issue Paper (PDF)(227 pp, 2 MB)
  • Biosketches (December 13-16, 2016) (PDF)(3 pp, 77 K)
  • Panel Members (december 13-16, 2016) (PDF)(3 pp, 66 K)
  • Agenda (December 13-16, 2016) (PDF)(8 pp, 45 K)
item.dc:creator: Dwood04

item.title: FIFRA Scientific Advisory Panel Historical Meetings
item.description:
The table below contains a list of Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act (FIFRA) Scientific Advisory Panel (SAP) meetings from 1996 to 2011. EPA establishes dockets when rulemaking or non-rulemaking actions are announced. Dockets may contain Federal Register documents, a variety of supporting documentation, and public comments. The table below presents links to meeting materials stored in electronic dockets established after May 22, 2002. Meeting materials for meetings prior to May 22, 2002 are available in the EPA Web Archive.

Available meeting materials include the agenda for the meeting, a list of the panel members with biographical information, meeting minutes transcribed from the proceedings, and supplemental materials where applicable.

To access the materials from a meeting, select the link in the Meeting Materials column of the Meetings Table.

Meetings Table

Sort alphabetically or by year by using the column headings. Find a meeting by using the search function, or use both features together. Delete your search criteria to clear the filter from the table.

Year Date Topic Meeting Materials

2011 May 24-26 Integrated Approaches to Testing and Assessment strategies (IATA): Use of New Computational and Molecular Tools EPA-HQ-OPP-2010-0588
2011 July 26-28 Re-Evaluation of Human Health Effects of Atrazine: Review of Non-Cancer Effects, Drinking Water Monitoring Frequency, and Cancer Epidemiology   EPA-HQ-OPP-2011-0399

item.title: Meeting Materials for the September 15-17, 2015 Scientific Advisory Panel

item.title: Confidential Financial Disclosure Form for Environmental Protection Agency Special Government Employees (EPA Form 3110-48)
item.description:
Several federal advisory committees at the US EPA use EPA Form 3110-48 to vet candidates for membership, to ensure there are no conflicts of interest.

  • Confidential Financial Disclosure Form for Environmental Protection Agency Special Government Employees (EPA Form 3110-48) (PDF)(10 pp, 522 K)
item.dc:creator: katie_connolly

item.title: FIFRA Scientific Advisory Panel Formation Process
item.description:
The following document provides detailed information on how EPA selects members of the Scientific Review Board to assist permanent members of the FIFRA Scientific Advisory Panel, including an outline of the process for nominating and selecting members and ethical considerations.

  • FIFRA Scientific Advisory Panel Formation Process (PDF)(16 pp, 123 K)
item.dc:creator: xdgallow
